TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit AddressHeader extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示一个地址头，它包装的地址信息项用于标识终结点或与终结点进行交互。

span.span: Represents a header that encapsulates an address information item used to identify or interact with an endpoint.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由名称和命名空间表示，并具有一个值，该值包含用于标识终结点或与终结点进行交互的可选信息。An is characterized by a name and namespace and has a value that contains optional information used to identify or interact with an endpoint. 名称可通过 属性访问，命名空间可通过 属性访问。The name can be accessed by the property and the namespace by the property. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建地址头，如何访问其属性，如何将其添加到服务终结点，以及如何使用终结点承载服务。The following example shows how to create address headers, access their properties, add them to a service endpoint and host the service using the endpoint.
